Client module documentation¶

Client messaging application. Supports messages are online, messages are encrypted using the RSA algorithm with a long key of 2048 bits.

Supports command line arguments:

python client_main.py -ip {ip server} -port {port} -n or --name {user login} -p или -password {password}

  1. {ip server} -ip - message server address

  2. {port} - port - on which connections are accepted.

  3. -n or --name - username with which to log in.

  4. -p or --password - user password.

Все опции командной строки являются необязательными, но имя пользователя и пароль необходимо использовать в паре.

Examples of using:

  • python client_main.py

Running the application with default settings.

  • python client_main.py 127.0.0.1 7777

Launching the application with instructions to connect to the server at ip_address:port

  • python client_main.py -n test1 -p 123

  • Launching the application with user test1 and password 123. *

  • python client_main.py ip_address some_port -n test1 -p 123

  • Launching the application with the user test1 and password 123 and instructing to connect to the server at ip_address: port. *

client_main.py¶

Launched module, contains parser of command line arguments and application initialization functionality.

client. get_args ()

Parser of command line arguments, returns a tuple of 4 elements:

  • server address

  • port

  • Username

  • password

class client.client_main.LoadingClient(connection, ip_server, port_server, client_login, client_password, database, encrypt_decrypt)¶

Performs initial client connection to the server, updating the database

class client.client_main.Client(connection, client_login, database, encrypt_decrypt)¶

Gui client module documentation¶

gui_main_window.py¶

class client.gui_client.gui_main_window.ClientMainWindow(app, client_transport, database_client)¶

Class of the main user interaction window.

add_contact(new_contact)¶

Сontact adding method.

add_contact_dialog()¶

Open add contact dialog method

add_message_history(message)¶

Add message user in history

clear_edit_message()¶

Button handler - clear. Clears message input fields.

connection_lost()¶

Server signal loss processing slot.

del_contact_dialog()¶

Method for calling the delete contact window.

field_disable()¶

Blocking function, input field and send button are not active until a recipient is selected.

get_message(sender)¶

Slot handler of incoming messages. Asks the user if a message was received not from the current interlocutor. If necessary, change the interlocutor.

history_list_update()¶

Message history update method.

init_ui()¶

Downloading the window configuration from the designer and subscribing handlers.

make_connection_with_signals(transport_client_obj)¶

Signal connection method.

select_active_user()¶

Interlocutor selection method.

send_message()¶

Sending an message to the current user

set_active_user()¶

The method of activating chat with the interlocutor.

update_clients_list()¶

“Updating the contact list on the main window.

update_users_all()¶

The method of filling out the list of possible contacts. List all registered users with the exception of those already added to the contacts and himself.
